traits.Keen Hearing and Smell: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
traits.Pack Tactics: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.Snow Camouflage: The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Cold Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
